name: trajStateEstimation
tagline: This work uses AFF to segment 3D Cartesian trajectories, and then Direct-Curve-Coding to encode the segmentation into an action grammar, as well as performing similarity measures, classification, and visualization
body:
This code has been used for the following publications:

J. Rojas, Zhenjie Huang, and Kensuke Harada, Robot Contact Task State Estimation via Action Grammars, IEEE-RAS Humanoids, 2016 (in-review).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
